owl:Ontology.dc:creator: María Poveda-Villalón (Ontology Engineering Group, Universidad Politécnica de Madrid)
Serge Chávez-Feria (Ontology Engineering Group, Universidad Politécnica de Madrid)
owl:Ontology.dc:description: The material properties ontology provides the vocabulary to describe the composition of building elements.
owl:Ontology.dc:title: Material properties ontology

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between a construction component (Layer, profile, constituent) and the materials that define them.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has material

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between a constituent set and the specific material constituents.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has material constituent

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between an element and its construction based in material constituents.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has material constituent set

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between a layer set and the specific material layers.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has material layer

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between an element and its construction based in material layers.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has material layer set

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relation between a profile set and the specific material profiles.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has material profile

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between an element and its construction based in material profiles.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has material profile set

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relationship between a feature of interest and a property of that feature.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has property

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relationship to connect a material or building element to an specific set of properties.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: has property set

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: Relation between a measurement with a specific material.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is measurement of material

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relationship identifying the unit of measure used for a certain entity.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: is measured in

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relationship between a property and the measurements it relates to.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: relates to measurement

owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:comment: A relationship between a measurement and the property it relates to.
owl:ObjectProperty.rdfs:label: relates to property

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A relationship to indicate the identifier used in the source database
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: identifier in database

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: Ifc identifier of the element in an IFC file.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: ifc identifier

owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:comment: A relationship defining the value of a certain property, e.g., energy or power. Note that, even if numeric values are expected to enable reasoning, measurement values could use other datatypes.
owl:DatatypeProperty.rdfs:label: has value

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: An element is a generalization of all components that make up an AEC product.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Element
Concrete with expanded clay or brick chippings aggregate
Insulating materials from renewable raw material

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A homogeneous or inhomogeneous substance that can be used to form elements (physical products or their components). (Definition taken from IFC)
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Material

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A single and identifiable part of an element which is constructed of a number of part (one or more) each having an individual material.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Material constituent

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A collection of individual material constituents, each assigning a material to a part of an element.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Material constituent set

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A single and identifiable part of an element which is constructed of a number of layers (one or more).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Material layer

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A designation by which materials of an element constructed of a number of material layers is known and through which the relative positioning of individual layers can be expressed.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Material layer set

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A single and identifiable cross section of an element which is constructed of a number of profiles (one or more).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Material profile

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: A designation by which individual material(s) of a prismatic element (for example, beam or column) constructed of a single or multiple material profiles is known.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Material profile set

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: N-ary class to unite specific properties related to building elements or materials.
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Property set
Reinforced concrete / normal concrete with reinforcement
Sealing tape and thermal bridge interrupter
Underlays and back coatings of floor covering.

owl:Class.rdfs:comment: The unit of measure is a standard for measurement of a quantity, such as a Property. For example, Power is a property and Watt is a unit of power that represents a definite predetermined power: when we say 10 Watt, we actually mean 10 times the definite predetermined power called watt. Our definition is based on the definition of unit of measure in the Ontology of units of Measure (OM). We propose here a list of some units of measure that are relevant for the purpose of SAREF, but this list can be extended, also using some other ontologies rather than the Ontology of units of Measure (OM).
owl:Class.rdfs:label: Unit of Measure
Wall element made of cellular concrete
Wall element made of lightweight concrete
